name: Pionnerverse
description:
Welcome to the Universe of Pionners

Defend your king wave by wave

In this little fun game, your goal is to survive of wave of enemies.

The more you survive the more difficult the game gets.

To gain a high score, you have to survive as must as possible.

To help you in this task, you have an army of loyal servants that you can upgrade.

The smaller the ally the faster it is.

Your enemies are little pixel monsters.

Be aware, the smaller they are the faster they are.

Some time a big boss came with a lot of life and dammage.

Good luck !

Upgrade your army  Use trampoline to kill distant enemies Don't died and make the best score possible

_____________________________________________________

Game in develoment with home made game engine

This alpha have only one game mode but more will come. 

If you are interesting in the game, feel free to come and discuss with us on discord, we hope to enlarge our team 😉

_____________________________________________________
